name: marketing-machine
description: An automated LinkedIn content creation system that transforms meeting recordings into high-quality social media posts

scripts.build: npm install --prefix frontend && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-test && git add -A && git commit -m 'deploy: Automated deployment with testing' && git push origin master

author: Marketing Machine
